import { useState } from 'react'; import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../images/symbol.svg'; import { Button, ButtonGroup, Divider, Toolbar, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'; import SecurityIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Security'; import MenuIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Menu'; import HeaderStyle from './headerStyle'; function Header(props) { const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); const [search, setSearch] = useState(''); const styles = HeaderStyle(); function changeIndex(pos) { setIndex(pos); if (pos === 0) props.history.push('security'); else props.history.push('person'); } function searchUser(event) { } return (
setSearch(e.target.value)} placeholder={'Pesquisar...'} type='text' value={search} />
); } export default Header;
